content: 3 x 1 rib or rib for purl haters everywhere by rachel gent size small medium large extra large materials 2 x tiger strømpegarn / sock yarn 186 yards/170 metres per 50g us #1 5/2 5mm needles for small circumference in the round dpns 1 long circular or 2 shorter circular stitch markers gauge 32 sts/44 rounds = 4 inches in stockinette stitch © rachel gent 2016 v1 0 1 pattern for personal use only cast on cast on 60 64 68 72 and join for working in the round leg begin pattern k1 p1 k3 14 15 16 17 times p1 k2 continue in pattern for 72 repeats in total or until leg reaches desired length approximately 2 shorter than length from base of heel heel heel worked over 29 33 33 37 stitches with 31 31 35 35 stitches left for top of foot turn row 1 sl1 purlwise wyif p28 32 32 36 row 2 sl1 purlwise wyib k1 14 16 16 18 times k1 repeat row 1 & 2 another 14 times shape heel row 1 sl1 p15 17 17 21 p2tog p1 turn row 2 sl1 k4 4 4 8 ssk k1 turn row 3 sl1 purl to 1 stitch before turn p2tog p1 turn row 4 sl1 knit to 1 stitch before turn ssk k1 turn repeat row 3 & 4 5 6 6 6 times in total until all stitches are worked 17 19 19 23 stitches gusset pick up and knit 15 stitches down right side of heel m1 btw heel and top of foot place marker work 31 31 35 35 stitches in pattern as set across top of foot place marker m1 btw top of foot and heel pick up and knit 15 stitches up left side of heel knit 8 9 9 12 place marker for new start of round 80 82 86 90 stitches on needle gusset shaping round 1 knit to 2 stitches before marker k2 decrease sl marker pattern across top of foot to marker sl marker ssk knit to end of round © rachel gent 2016 v1 0 2 pattern for personal use only round 2 knit to marker sl marker pattern to marker sl marker knit to end of round repeat last two rounds until 29 33 33 37 stitches remain for insole remove beginning of round marker knit to right side of foot marker new beginning of round foot continue in pattern as set on top of foot and in stocking stitch on the insole until foot measures 2 inches 5cm less that required length measured from back of heel shape toe set up rounds we need to even up the number of stitches on top of foot and insole that is decrease 2 on the top of foot for small and large sizes and decrease 2 on insole for medium and x-large sizes round 1 knit round 2 knit 1 ssk 1 0 1 0 knit to 3 stitches before marker k2
